Reviews.Title: “bring your own towels, bed, mug, politeness and a sense of humour”
Reviews.Author: Marcus N
Reviews.Content: partner arrived 230pm saturday told twin available pay £15 extra night happy double bed booked call receptionist told stay standard ok advised stay corbigoe despite offered twin vacancy sign door park hotel 64 belgrave road 4 floors steep stairs – 14 standard double bed wardrobe hooks – hang clothes cupboards drawers shelves bed single sheet double bed half bed covered mattress exposed thin blanket sheet lay bed towel mug unwashed spoon coffee tea sugar unable unpack hang clothes spent night getting ready stepping kettle fit tap fill scooping water dirty mug kettle plugged plug half wall kettle held whilst boiled reception change advised available bed remade double sheet wish lay exposed mattress told wrong bed sheets changed stay – lot arguing finally sheet bed ourselves extra towel told towels stay tried explaining reasonable expect towel arguing finally extra towel mug receptionist extremely rude unhelpful hard extra items speak manager advised available monday am returned minutes receptionist burst knocking terrible refund cleaner job properly tomorrow fk fk completely shocked outburst receptionist continually apologised agreeing disgusting tomorrow sunday refund saturday brought plate sugar contained dirty bits unpleasant nights sleep dirty cold showered disgusting mouldy shower sit toilet sideways legs fit front night returned hotel separate times partner bed taking key reception leave key desk returned 4am knocking continually reception window receptionist bed reception floor advised key wake partner following morning chose breakfast hotel feel satisfied food hygiene standards spoke receptionist morning apologised speak manager monday morning arrange refund meantime arranged return original hotel larger wardrobe hang clothes – waiting walked corbigoe luggage told receptionist pay £15 extra time annoyed paying anymore 3rd floor – 13 larger wardrobe contained dirty beds single sheet mattress disgusting hang clothes beds night extremely uncomfortable towel rail fell wall tv 4 channels stay noted fire door propped advised receptionist correct fire doors remain closed prevent spread fire receptionist accept left people inout grave concern 4th floor means escape event fire set stairs doors constantly propped noticed fire extinguishers required month night returned hotel partner key receptionist spare key told key partner happy insisted door master key finally key return immediately unlocking door wish walk updown 4 flights steep stairs reluctantly followed key chose breakfast hotel explained receptionist wished written confirmation complaints refused speak manager manager holiday photos send mentioned faults wish am operations manager warner hotel realise £50 night getting special london – clean sleep shower breakfast expect clean bed towels blankets sheets stay hotel booked treated rudely paid night stay hotel booked experience ruined weekend uncomfortable walking washing dirty stepping hang tried speak manager refused 3times
